products.description: Runs the prepare wrapper application to prepare remote data for SecHub scans.

optional.description: Prepare process timeout in seconds for prepare processes started with process builder. Can not be higher than the pds product timeout
Flag to enable the skopeo prepare module
It is possible to customize the authentication file name for skopeo - but normally not necessary
Flag to enable the git prepare module
When set to true, a git clone will be done with depth level 1 only and the .git folder will be deleted before upload
When enabled, additional git files like .gitignore or .gitattributes will be automatically removed before storage upload is done

products.description: Runs the prepare mock which returns a success message.
